title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2000/93 of 23 July 1993 fixing the storage aid for unprocessed dried grapes and dried figs from the 1992/93 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2000/93 of 23 July 1993 fixing the storage aid for unprocessed dried grapes and dried figs from the 1992/93 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The storage aid referred to in Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 627/85 shall, for products from the 1992/93 marketing year, be as set out in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 July 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 49, 27. 2. 1986, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 166, 20. 6. 1992, p. 5.
(3) OJ No L 72, 13. 3. 1985, p. 17.
(4) OJ No L 350, 14. 12. 1990, p. 56.
ANNEX
STORAGE AID FOR UNPROCESSED DRIED GRAPES AND DRIED FIGS FROM THE 1992/93 MARKETING YEAR   A. DRIED GRAPES
